title.rendered: STEDI Micro V2 26 Inch 48 LED Flood Light (5700K)

content.rendered:
Micro V2 26 Inch 48 LED Flood Light (5700K)

MICRO SIZE, MACRO PERFORMANCE
We’ve taken our popular Micro LED Lights to the next level. Integrating a beautiful 5700k white temperature, the Micro V2 48 LED is designed to punch above its own weight.

LIGHTWEIGHT CONVENIENCE
The power and brilliance of the Micro V2 48 LED are packed into a convenient size of 665mm (length) x 25mm (height) x 40.6mm (depth). Did we mention that it weighs 0.8kg?

LOW PROFILE FITMENT
The Micro V2 48 LED provides a huge amount of application options. With the ability to fit into the tightest of spaces, you will be kept occupied with opportunities for enhancement.

The nitty gritty.

KEY FEATURES AT A GLANCE

IP67 Ingress Protection
6 x 3 Watt CREE LED
Micro Profile at only 26mm
Flood Beam – Perfect Rear Light, Awning Light, or bumper or bull bar voids.
Waterproof Deutsch Connectors Male and Female with wire tails

Tech Specs

OPERATING VOLTAGE DC 10-28V
POWER CONSUMPTION 48W
AMP DRAW 5.5a @ 12v / 2.25a @ 24v
COLOUR TEMPERATURE 5700K
LED 48 x OSRAM GW PSLR 32. PM DRUISS
EFFECTIVE LUMEN 5,100lm
BEAM ANGLE Height: 30° Width: 120°
ENVIRONMENT TEMP -40° to 60°C
IP RATING IP68
LENS Polycarbonate with Surface Hardening
FRAME/HOUSING Extruded Aluminium
DT CONNECTOR Included
MOUNTING BRACKET 304# Stainless Steel
LIFETIME 30,000hrs
SIZE (mm) 666 x 26.3 x 40.6
WEIGHT 0.8kg
CABLE LENGTH 400mm
CERTIFICATION CISPR25

 

What’s Included

  • 1 x 26 Inch Micro V2 LED Work Light (White)
  • 2 x 46mm Side Brackets
  • 2 x M8 Bolts
  • 2 x M6 Bolts
  • 2 x Nuts
  • 4 x Flat Washer
  • 4 x Spring Washer
  • Male & Female Deutsch Connectors

excerpt.rendered:
STEDI Micro V2 26 Inch 48 LED Flood Light (5700K)

Please note: If product is out of stock, wait times for this product can be between approx. 1 – 4 weeks from date of order.
